name: Juniper And Berries
keywords: apple juice, clove, creme de cassis, gin, lemon juice, maple syrup, red currants

recipeInstructions.text: Put liquid ingredients in a saucepan. Add lemon peel, pierced with the cloves. Warm for about two minutes over medium flame, but do not boil. Strain. Serve in a tempered-glass mug. Garnish with currants.
